### Request Details

Agency: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
---------------------------------------------------------------

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada has a requirement for a digital PCR platform with supporting services including installation, on-site training, maintenance, and a one-year warranty.

### Scope of Work

The successful contractor must provide the entire automated digital PCR platform, including:

*   Hardware components and software required for operation, data acquisition, and data processing
*   Installation of the platform
*   On-site training and support
*   Documentation of the platform and its operation
*   A one-year warranty, which includes maintenance and support services

### Eligibility Requirements

The contract is open for tendering under the following trade agreements:

*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
